title: From Anxiety to Well-being: How AI Chatbots Can Revitalize Mental Health With Eyes Open
description: While stories of "AI psychosis" have caused concern, a closer look shows that artificial intelligence, when used carefully, offers powerful tools to improve mental health care. Beyond the potential issues, AIs unique strengths, accessibility, personalized support, and early intervention are helping millions find relief and understanding like never before, setting the stage for a brighter digital future.
content:

title: Wharfies to get ‘monumental’ pay rise of up to 32pc
description: The maritime union has secured a historic deal to lift the pay of hundreds of wharfies at the Port of Melbourne Webb Dock terminal and restrict the use of artificial intelligence.
content:
The maritime union has secured a historic deal that would lift the pay of hundreds of wharfies at Melbourne’s Webb Dock terminal by up to a third and restrict the use of artificial intelligence and other new technologies.

title: Ukraine Wants to Turn Wartime Data Into Bargaining 'Card' With Allies
description: Ukraine's war footage and records, which its digital minister says are "priceless," can be useful for training combat artificial intelligence models.
content:
Ukraine's drone warfare has created a deep trove of battlefield data that can be used to train artificial intelligence.

title: TCS shares in focus as IT major sets up new AI transformation unit
description: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) has formed a dedicated artificial intelligence (AI) and services transformation unit, consolidating its AI capabilities to deliver domain-specific solutions and accelerate innovation across industries. Amit Kapur, who previously headed TCSs UK and Ireland business, will lead the unit from September. The move underscores TCSs push to place AI at the core of its growth strategy.
